page.title: 16FOOD SURVEY.
page.content: On the 10 10 85 40 girls & 36 boys aged 11 & 12 were asked about food & eating habits.Results are in %. 1.{What did you have for breakfast? Cerals & drink 47.4,toast & drink 17.1,cerals,toast & drink 17.1,just a drink 7.9, nothing 7.9,cooked 2.6 2.{Where did you spend lunchtime? Packed lunch at school 52.6,school lunch 26.3,went home 19.7,absent 1.3. 3.{What did you have in the evening? } Convenience foods 26.3,carcass meat 20.0,poultry 12,pies 10.5,fish 9.2, eggs 5.2,stew 5.2,nothing 5.2. 4.{What would you like to eat if you {could have anything?}Main item-meats 26.3,poultry 23.7,convenience 23.7,stew/curry 6.6,fish 6.6,salad 5.2,others 7.9. Vegetables-chips 46.0,roast pots.26.3,mashed pots.9.2,rice 5.3,beans 2.6 and others 10.6.
